Description: Fragment of foot and lower wall of East Greek pottery bowl; sharply flaring ring foot. Interior glazed save for tondo; traces of added colour bands; in tondo, rosette of alternating leaves and triple tongues around dot and three circles. Exterior: end of nine verticals descending from handle zone, crossing a pair of horizontal lines; band below; lower wall and outside of foot glazed, underside reserved
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (East Greek 219)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.062)
